=== TOUR START: Reefworld Fly / Cruise ===
Reefworld Fly / Cruise
Marvel at the earth’s largest living organism and one of the southern hemisphere’s largest island resorts all in one day with this fly and cruise combination to the Great Barrier Reef, Whitehaven Beach and Hamilton Island.
2.0 hours on-board ReefWorld
Check In Port Of Airlie
Safety Briefing & Tour Check-In
Scenic Flight To Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld
Depart Hamilton Island on a one-way helicopter flight (approx. 30 minutes) with scenic views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet and Heart Reef.
2.0 Hrs At Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld
Spend 2.0 hours out at the Great Barrier Reef where snorkeling, a semi submersible and lunch are provided by Cruise Whitsundays.
Cruise Whitsunday Vessel Departs For Airlie Beach
Finally, sit back and enjoy your scenic Cruise back through the Whitsundays.
One-way helicopter flight with scenic views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet and Heart Reef Spend 2.0 hours at Reefworld
All snorkel gear and wetsuits provided by Reefworld
(Flight is operated by Hamilton Island Air and Cruise portion is operated by Cruise Whitsundays)
per child (3-13 incl)
Book Now save 10%
Get Ready For The Experience Of A Lifetime
Helireef offers helicopter and cruise combination tours throughout The Whitsundays including to world famous Heart Reef, The Great Barrier Reef, Hamilton Island, Whitehaven Beach and Daydream Island. Our tours include scenic flights, helicopter transfers, reef fly/cruises, snorkelling, beach picnics and more.
for the experience of a lifetime.

=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Escape ===
Spend 75 minutes on one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Fly by helicopter to Whitehaven beach and on the way take in the breathtaking aerial view of the surrounding Whitsunday Islands and fringing reefs. Whilst at Whitehaven Beach soak up the sun and relax with chilled sparkling wine and water. This tour provides the perfect opportunity for fantastic photographs and video footage, not to be forgotten.
Safety Briefing & Tour Check-In
Check in to Shop 14, Coral Sea Marina, 20 minutes prior to departure. Our friendly pilot will take you through our safety briefing and get you ready for your tour.
Fly By Helicopter To Whitehaven Beach
Take in the breathtaking aerial view of the surrounding Whitsunday Islands and fringing reefs.
Stopover At Whitehaven Beach For 75 Minutes
Whilst at Whitehaven Beach soak up the sun and relax with chilled sparkling wine and water.
After a breathtaking tour of one of the most beautiful parts of the world, sit back and relax as your pilot fly’s you back to Whitsunday Airport.
See the great white beach
Sparkling wine and water Beach gear
Minimum booking – 2 passengers (single passenger bookings on existing flights only)
Tour duration 2 hours.
Book Now save 10%
Get Ready For The Experience Of A Lifetime
Helireef offers helicopter and cruise combination tours throughout The Whitsundays including to world famous Heart Reef, The Great Barrier Reef, Hamilton Island, Whitehaven Beach and Daydream Island. Our tours include scenic flights, helicopter transfers, reef fly/cruises, snorkelling, beach picnics and more.

=== TOUR START: Reefworld Fly / Cruise ===
Reefworld Fly / Cruise
Marvel at the earth’s largest living organism and one of the southern hemisphere’s largest island resorts all in one day with this fly and cruise combination to the Great Barrier Reef, Whitehaven Beach and Hamilton Island.
2.0 hours on-board ReefWorld
Check In Port Of Airlie
Safety Briefing & Tour Check-In
Scenic Flight To Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld
Depart Hamilton Island on a one-way helicopter flight (approx. 30 minutes) with scenic views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet and Heart Reef.
2.0 Hrs At Cruise Whitsundays Reefworld
Spend 2.0 hours out at the Great Barrier Reef where snorkeling, a semi submersible and lunch are provided by Cruise Whitsundays.
Cruise Whitsunday Vessel Departs For Airlie Beach
Finally, sit back and enjoy your scenic Cruise back through the Whitsundays.
One-way helicopter flight with scenic views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet and Heart Reef Spend 2.0 hours at Reefworld
All snorkel gear and wetsuits provided by Reefworld
(Flight is operated by Hamilton Island Air and Cruise portion is operated by Cruise Whitsundays)
per child (3-13 incl)
Book Now save 10%
Get Ready For The Experience Of A Lifetime
Helireef offers helicopter and cruise combination tours throughout The Whitsundays including to world famous Heart Reef, The Great Barrier Reef, Hamilton Island, Whitehaven Beach and Daydream Island. Our tours include scenic flights, helicopter transfers, reef fly/cruises, snorkelling, beach picnics and more.
for the experience of a lifetime.

=== TOUR START: Whitehaven Beach Escape ===
Spend 75 minutes on one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. Fly by helicopter to Whitehaven beach and on the way take in the breathtaking aerial view of the surrounding Whitsunday Islands and fringing reefs. Whilst at Whitehaven Beach soak up the sun and relax with chilled sparkling wine and water. This tour provides the perfect opportunity for fantastic photographs and video footage, not to be forgotten.
Safety Briefing & Tour Check-In
Check in to Shop 14, Coral Sea Marina, 20 minutes prior to departure. Our friendly pilot will take you through our safety briefing and get you ready for your tour.
Fly By Helicopter To Whitehaven Beach
Take in the breathtaking aerial view of the surrounding Whitsunday Islands and fringing reefs.
Stopover At Whitehaven Beach For 75 Minutes
Whilst at Whitehaven Beach soak up the sun and relax with chilled sparkling wine and water.
After a breathtaking tour of one of the most beautiful parts of the world, sit back and relax as your pilot fly’s you back to Whitsunday Airport.
See the great white beach
Sparkling wine and water Beach gear
Minimum booking – 2 passengers (single passenger bookings on existing flights only)
Tour duration 2 hours.
Book Now save 10%
Get Ready For The Experience Of A Lifetime
Helireef offers helicopter and cruise combination tours throughout The Whitsundays including to world famous Heart Reef, The Great Barrier Reef, Hamilton Island, Whitehaven Beach and Daydream Island. Our tours include scenic flights, helicopter transfers, reef fly/cruises, snorkelling, beach picnics and more.
for the experience of a lifetime.
